titles.title: John Saw The Multitude, Of The Overcomers

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
John saw the multitude, of the overcomers,
All of them were worshipping the Lord.
Some of them were singing.
Some of them were shouting.
But all of them were worshipping the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O praise the Lord! O praise the Lord!
Sing glory, Hallelujah, praise the Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Hallelujah, Hallelujah, Hallelujah,
Hallelujah, Hallelujah, praise the Lord!
Hallelujah, Hallelujah, Hallelujah,
Hallelujah, Hallelujah, praise the Lord!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Juan vio el numero de los redimidos,
Y todos alababan al Señor.
Unos cantaban otros danzaban,
Pero todos alababan al Señor.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Alabare, alabare, alabare a mi Señor.
Alabare, alabare, alabare a mi Señor.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Aleluya, aleluya, aleluya, aleluya,
Aleluya al Señor. Aleluya, aleluya, aleluya, aleluya a nuestro Salvador.
